description: Determines whether a product code is associated with an instance. This action can only be used by the owner of the product code. It is useful when a product code owner must verify whether another user's instance is eligible for support.

parameters.name: ProductCode
parameters.description: The product code. This must be a product code that you own.

nested_items.name: Return
nested_items.description: The return value of the request. Returns true if the specified product code is owned by the requester and associated with the specified instance.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the instance owner. This is only present if the product code is attached to the instance.
